name: Evanski's Raccoon Adventure
description:
A Game by EvanSki,

Made for the GMC Jam 41 "A Big Mistake"

Game Maker Community Page

An Point & Click  Adventure, Were you take the role of the fabled Green Raccoon Himself! After Releasing His evil clone, go on an adventure and meet up with 3 GMC friends!  

Will you defeat the Evil Evansky?
